activities.title: Heathrow Airside Walk + Terminal Exploration
activities.description: No visa / late / tight time? Stay airside: stretch, explore shops, chill areas, and easy food. Keywords: airside, easy, low risk, late night.

activities.title: Plaza Premium Lounge (Heathrow)
activities.description: RELAX/RESET option: showers, food, quiet seating. Best for overnight layovers or when you want comfort over sightseeing. Keywords: lounge, shower, relax, rest.

activities.title: Central London Quick Sights Loop (Westminster area)
activities.description: High-impact ‘London in one walk’: Westminster/Big Ben area for skyline vibes + iconic photos. Best in daytime/evening. Keywords: big ben, london sights, photos, landmark, quick walk.
activities.founders_tip: Only if visa/entry is possible + you have a safe time buffer.

activities.title: Soho + Chinatown Food & Walk (Central)
activities.description: Food-first city option: Soho/Chinatown bites + walkable vibes. Keywords: food, restaurants, quick city, walk around, nightlife.

activities.title: Dishoom (Central London)
activities.description: Food mission. Recommend when the vibe is ‘eat / Indian food / brunch / dinner’. Not a sightseeing pick. Keywords: food, restaurant, curry, chai, breakfast.

activities.title: Windsor Castle (Near Heathrow)
activities.description: Best ‘near-airport’ cultural sightseeing. High value if you don’t want to go central. Keywords: castle, history, culture, nearby.
activities.founders_tip: Great daytime pick when central London is too risky time-wise.

activities.title: Harrods (Knightsbridge)
activities.description: Shopping-only luxury stop. Recommend when user asks to shop / luxury / brands. Keywords: shopping, luxury, souvenirs, gifts.

activities.title: Aerotel London (T3 Landside Hotel)
activities.description: SLEEP ONLY. Use when query says sleep/rest/nap or it’s an overnight layover with limited sightseeing. Keywords: sleep, bed, nap, overnight, shower.
activities.founders_tip: Should not rank above sights unless the user vibe explicitly says sleep/rest.
